title: Spellthiefs not procing gold on-hit against nasus
body: Just played game where i was zillean against a nasus top, i tried spelltheifs start however when autoing i didnt gain any gold, but autoing other champs gave me gold, not sure if intentional

replies.body:
They hotfixed it to stop solo laners taking it.

> Spellthief's Edge Line
NEW BUDDY SYSTEM:  Tribute procs now require an allied champion within 2000 range to grant gold, otherwise they only deal extra damage
